title: Lambdλ™ Flat Watch Face
summary: Lambdλ™ Watchfaces.  Elegant designs with superior performance.
description: Lambdλ™(pronounced lambda)  Watchfaces are the highest quality watchfaces available to date. Elegant designs mesh with unsurpassed performance and elite functionality. Lambdλ™ Watchfaces provide the user with stunning and practical utilities such as weather, time, date, and battery percentage. Lambdλ™ Watchfaces also feature a sweeping second hand, which emulates a mechanical watch movement. The Lambdλ™ Watchfaces come in a variety of styles to suit personalities and tastes alike. Lambdλ™ Watchfaces: quality and elegance at your command. Proudly USA Made.Weather provided by OpenWeatherMap.MUST HAVE ANDROID WEAR 5.0 UPDATE FOR Lambdλ Watchfaces TO WORK!Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Samsung Galaxy Gear Live(not Galaxy gear or Tizen based Gears), Sony smartwatch 3(not 2 and below), Asus ZenWatch and LG G WatchOfficial Google+ community: https://plus.google.com/communities/114183605812239293382If the watch face does not show up on the watch,  go into the Android Wear application and click "resync apps"Please don't hesitate to email me if you have any questions.
descriptionHTML:
Lambdλ™(pronounced lambda) Watchfaces are the highest quality watchfaces available to date. Elegant designs mesh with unsurpassed performance and elite functionality. Lambdλ™ Watchfaces provide the user with stunning and practical utilities such as weather, time, date, and battery percentage. Lambdλ™ Watchfaces also feature a sweeping second hand, which emulates a mechanical watch movement. The Lambdλ™ Watchfaces come in a variety of styles to suit personalities and tastes alike. Lambdλ™ Watchfaces: quality and elegance at your command.

Proudly USA Made.
Weather provided by OpenWeatherMap.
MUST HAVE ANDROID WEAR 5.0 UPDATE FOR Lambdλ Watchfaces TO WORK!
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Samsung Galaxy Gear Live(not Galaxy gear or Tizen based Gears), Sony smartwatch 3(not 2 and below), Asus ZenWatch and LG G Watch
Official Google+ community: https://plus.google.com/communities/114183605812239293382


If the watch face does not show up on the watch, go into the Android Wear application and click "resync apps"
Please don't hesitate to email me if you have any questions.
comments: Amazing This is by far one of my favorite watch faces. I've been using it for the last couple months and have had no problems with it.
The weather circle just says "no data".. Send a fix or help me fix the weather circle
